2: <mistake>'gyur //sems</mistake> dpa'i <mistake>bhin</mistake> gyis brlabs sbyor <mistake>yang//rang</mistake> byin brlab 'di grub mchog ste//de <mistake>nyid/ nyin</mistake> re grub pa ni//rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob <mistake>po//de</mistake> la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das
3: kun <mistake>du</mistake> bzang po'i spyod pa yin zhe <mistake>n/ gsungs</mistake> <mistake>pa/ snying</mistake> stobs rdul dang mun pa <mistake>yang//ca</mistake> phyir sems can don du 'gyur//de phyir kun <mistake>du</mistake> <mistake>hzang</mistake> po yi//ci bzhin byang sems spyod ces <mistake>'gro/</mistake>
4: de la <mistake>ji</mistake> <mistake>lar</mistake> bcom ldan 'das bdud dang bdud las <mistake>rgyala</mistake> yin zhe <mistake>nas/sems</mistake> de kho na bdud yin te//sems de <mistake>khon</mistake> de bzhin gshegs//rang sems 'dul ba'i don <mistake>tu</mistake> ni//bdag ni bdud
5: nyid nye bar <mistake>'gro //de</mistake> la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das//mngon par byang chub dang sangs rgyas yin <mistake>zhena/rang</mistake> sems so sor <mistake>'pigs</mistake> pa ni//byang chub sems mchog rdo rje nyid//de nyid de las
6: de sangs rgyas//rang byin brlabs mchog bsgoms phyir ro//de la ji ltar bcom <mistake>lnga n</mistake> <mistake>'ngs</mistake> rdo rje gtum mo mthar byed <mistake>dang // phyag</mistake> na rdo rje yin zhe <mistake>na/dbyor</mistake> med so sor <mistake>'bgs</mistake> pa <mistake>ni//sngang</mistake>
7: <mistake>bathams</mistake> cad nges par <mistake>gnon //sangs</mistake> <mistake>rgas</mistake> kun <mistake>dngo</mistake> rdo rje <mistake>n//byang</mistake> chub sems rnams brtan pa <mistake>yin //brtan</mistake> pa thams cad 'grub don du//rgyal ba <mistake>bdaggis</mistake> kun bzang gi//phyag la
8: <mistake>/phyag</mistake> <mistake>mtsham</mistake> de byin te//des de phyag na rdo rje yin//de la ji ltar dang po'i rigs <mistake>'byur</mistake> ba yin zhe <mistake>na/mani</mistake> shes rab <mistake>pa</mistake> rol <mistake>phyin//pa</mistake> ni thabs la mkhas pa <mistake>ste //'dul</mistake> phyir rdo rje sems <mistake>dapla</mistake>
